EmailTemplate.subject: Your Imc CAM Connection - February Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
February 2012 Edition (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Feb12_Main.html) Welcome to the February issue of Imc Solutions' CAM Connection newsletter. The main page gives you an overall glance at what this month's newsletter has to offer. We hope you enjoy it.
Important Alerts & Updates (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Feb12_AlertUpdates.html)

> IMC Contract Trainers Needed
> Attention ALL IMC Customers
> Monthly Customer Service Webinar Program

> Server Migration Preparation
> Fix it with Felicia [WEBINAR] DDACTS (Data-Driven Approaches to Crime and Traffic Safety)
> TriCON 2012
Technical Support Hot Topics (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Feb12_TechnicalSupportHotTopics.html)
> Technical Q&As

> January Client News
